item.title: Getting started with StatSVN (0.7.0) and CollabNet Subversion Server
item.description: While a tool like TortoiseSVN allows limited reporting on Subversion repositories, using a tool like StatSVN generates much more useful reports.

item.title: Subversion repository dump: WPF and Silverlight application, with MVVM (revision 25)
item.description: Subversion repository dump and export with code for a Visual Studio 2010 solution with WPF and Silverlight clients, using the sample Northwind database, and the MVVM pattern.

item.title: iTunes Playlists to Xml: Parsing categories with LINQ
item.description: LINQ to parse the XML export from iTunes Playlists to Xml for musical genres/categories.

item.title: Extended iTunes Track class for PHP
item.description: Having created a base class in PHP for an iTunes track, here's an extended class, with sample code.

item.title: iTunes Track class in C# and PHP
item.description: An iTunes music track class written in C# and PHP.

item.title: Manually updating CollabNet Subversion Server and TortoiseSVN
item.description: Manually upgrading CollabNet Subversion Server and TortoiseSVN.
